entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind light except northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 near Bowen Island this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind light except north 30 km/h gusting to 50 over southern sections in the morning and early in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023
